divs: sighting detailsi woke up one night from bed well after my fiance and i had fell asleep. i was sitting on the end of the bed looking at one of the "others" (entity)in the room at the foot of the bed between the bed and the window\wall, which, along with the computer desk, was all i could see behind him. he began conversing in a language which i did not and do not understand as it was comprised of mostly metal-scraping sound and chirping. i saw the "other", he had big oval obsidian eyes and stood about 5'6". i could not understand the language yet i knew what he way saying, as if he were communicating telepathically in a manner i could understand. i distinctly remember him tell me his name in a way i could speak it as "raucyac", and told me that he was there to talk to me. he also "told" me that he was a youth in his culture, and with the soft features and gentle bearing it felt to be accurate. i also felt safe and mentally intimate and a strong bond to him. we talked for a long period of time, but i am not sure how long as i was entranced on him. i remember that he was conversing with me for a long time as friends would, but i do not recall everything that we spoke about. at one point in the conversation, he pointed at my sleeping fiance and made what i am equating to be a smile. he had very long, slender, wiry arms and fingers. his skin was a graphite to deep steel color. he was quite thin as i could see his ribcage. he then made his goodbye and i blacked out and the next thing i remember i blacked out and woke up the next morning extremely refreshed and energetic and happy.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Westbrook
There were no other sightings in Westbrook on or around February 25th 2011
